name: Peteca Simulator
description:
Welcome to Peteca Simulator! The Brazilian folk game of Peteca is now available for each and everyone! 

Instructions: use the mouse cursor to tackle the peteca (ball) and try to keep it in air.

- Enjoy the whole peteca game experience in all its authenticity!
- Advanced physics simulation!
- Permadeath: lose the peteca and your done!
- Watch your score to track your performance!
- Skip dialogues: you're in control!
- No sound at all: enough of annoying effects or silly musics to disturb your focus!
- Wonderful minimalistic artwork to garantee ultimate immersion!

Are you ready for the Peteca?

Background images taken from Google.

Made in a few hours for the Low Effort Jam 24. I regret nothing!
